thing-type.label: Proxy Device
thing-type.description: A proxy device to notifiy the sense monitor of real-time power draw. All channels are "one-way" in that they only report their settings to Sense.

parameter.name: powerLevels
parameter.label: Power Levels
parameter.description: Power levels for different states. Examples: "5W" (static full ON power), ".2W, 5W" (for static power range), "OFF=.2W, LOW=2W, HIGH=5W" (for static power in different states), ".2,2W,2.5W,3W" (for non-linear dimmer rage".

parameter.name: macAddress
parameter.label: Spoof'd MAC Address
parameter.description: A spoof'ed MAC address for this proxy device.

parameter.name: senseName
parameter.label: Sense Name
parameter.description: Name of device to be used by Sense.

channel-type.label: Power Level
channel-type.description: Realtime power to send to Sense. Note, if you are using the Switch, Dimmer or State channels, it is not necessary to use this channel.

channel-type.label: Device Switch
channel-type.description: OnOff switch to notify when device is On/Off. This will report to sense the full ON or full OFF values specified.

channel-type.label: Device Dimmer
channel-type.description: Dimmer to notify the current power. This will report to sense an interpolated value based on the specified levels.

channel-type.label: Device State
channel-type.description: Current device state. This will report to sense the specified power based on the device state.
